metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6111 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: linux netfilter: the expired catchall element is not deactivated and removed from GC sync path.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
